trans-unit.source: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an audit rule for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 表示定义文件或目录的审核规则的访问控制项 (ACE) 的抽象。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>类表示基础访问控制项 (ACE)，指定的用户帐户，要提供 （读取、 写入和等等） 的访问的类型的抽象，以及是否执行审核。

trans-unit.source: This class can also specify how audit rules are inherited from and propagated to objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类还可以指定如何从继承的审核规则和传播到对象。

trans-unit.source: To permit file and directory auditing on Windows NT or later, you must enable Audit Access Security policy on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许文件和目录审核 Windows NT 或更高版本，必须在您的计算机上启用审核访问安全策略。

trans-unit.source: By default, this policy is set to No Auditing.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此策略设置为无审核。

trans-unit.source: To enable the Audit Access Security policy, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要启用审核访问安全策略，请执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Open the **Local Security Settings** Microsoft Management Console (MMC) snap-in, located in the Administrative Tools folder.
trans-unit.target: 打开**本地安全设置**Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 管理单元中，位于管理工具文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Expand the Local Policies folder and left-click the Audit Policy folder.
trans-unit.target: 展开本地策略文件夹并左键单击审核策略文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Double-click the **Audit object access** entry on the right pane of the MMC snap-in, or right-click and choose Properties to display the **Audit object access properties** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 双击**审核对象访问**上的 MMC 管理单元中，右窗格中的条目或右键单击，然后选择要显示的属性**审核对象访问属性**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Select the **Success** or **Failure** check boxes to log successes or failures.
trans-unit.target: 选择**成功**或**失败**复选框以记录成功或失败。

trans-unit.source: Note that an audit rule for a user account requires a corresponding access rule for the same user account.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，用户帐户的审核规则的相同的用户帐户需要相应的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> class to create a new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>类创建新的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: You can persist this rule using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留此规则使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> class to add and then remove an audit rule from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>类添加，然后从文件中删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: 封装对用户帐户的引用的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定何时执行审核。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> 类的新实例：对用户帐户的引用、指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型的值，以及指定何时执行审核的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建审核规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged.
trans-unit.target: 审核规则可确定何时以及如何对系统对象执行操作如文件和文件夹，被记录下来。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数不是一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> value was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> 值被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user account.
trans-unit.target: 用户帐户的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定何时执行审核。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> class using a user account name, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> 类的新实例：用户帐户名称、指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型的值，以及指定何时执行审核的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建审核规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged.
trans-unit.target: 审核规则可确定何时以及如何对系统对象执行操作如文件和文件夹，被记录下来。

trans-unit.source: The `identity` parameter must identify a valid account on the current computer or domain.
trans-unit.target: `identity`参数必须标识当前计算机或域上有效的帐户。

trans-unit.source: The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串采用以下形式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的域名或计算机名的名称和`account`是域或计算机上的有效的用户帐户的名称： `DOMAIN\account`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> class to add and then remove an audit rule from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>类添加，然后从文件中删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> value was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> 值被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: 封装对用户帐户的引用的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> values that specifies how access masks are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问掩码如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> values that specifies how Access Control Entries (ACEs) are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问控制项 (ACE) 如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定何时执行审核。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> class using the name of a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> 类的新实例：对用户帐户的引用的名称、指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型的值、确定如何继承权限的值、确定如何传播权限的值，以及指定何时执行审核的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建审核规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged.
trans-unit.target: 审核规则可确定何时以及如何对系统对象执行操作如文件和文件夹，被记录下来。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数不是一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="identity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> value was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> 值被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user account.
trans-unit.target: 用户帐户的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 值之一，该值指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> values that specifies how access masks are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问掩码如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> values that specifies how Access Control Entries (ACEs) are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定访问控制项 (ACE) 如何传播到子对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> values that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> 值之一，该值指定何时执行审核。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the audit rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies when to perform auditing.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下内容初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> 类的新实例：用户帐户的名称、指定与审核规则关联的操作的类型的值、确定如何继承权限的值、确定如何传播权限的值，以及指定何时执行审核的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an audit rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建审核规则，您可以保留使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>类。

trans-unit.source: Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects, such as files and folders, are logged.
trans-unit.target: 审核规则可确定何时以及如何对系统对象执行操作如文件和文件夹，被记录下来。

trans-unit.source: The `identity` parameter must identify a valid account on the current computer or domain.
trans-unit.target: `identity`参数必须标识当前计算机或域上有效的帐户。

trans-unit.source: The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串采用以下形式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的域名或计算机名的名称和`account`是域或计算机上的有效的用户帐户的名称： `DOMAIN\account`。

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误枚举被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> value was passed to the <paramref name="flags" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.None" /> 值被传递给 <paramref name="flags" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> flags associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取与当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> 标志。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> flags associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 与当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule" /> 标志。
